<span id="sec-13.1.13" class="secnum">[13.1.13](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-block-runtime-semantics-evaluation "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: Evaluation
=========================================================================================================================================================================================================

*Block* <span class="geq">:</span> `{` `}`

1.  Return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(<span style="font-family: sans-serif">empty</span>).

*Block* <span class="geq">:</span> `{` *StatementList* `}`

1.  Let *oldEnv* be [the running execution context](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts)’s [LexicalEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts).
2.  Let *blockEnv* be [NewDeclarativeEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-newdeclarativeenvironment)(*oldEnv*).
3.  Perform [BlockDeclarationInstantiation](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-blockdeclarationinstantiation)(*StatementList,* *blockEnv*).
4.  Set [the running execution context](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts)’s [LexicalEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts) to *blockEnv*.
5.  Let *blockValue* be the result of evaluating *StatementList*.
6.  Set [the running execution context](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts)’s [LexicalEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts) to *oldEnv*.
7.  Return *blockValue*.

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> No matter how control leaves the *Block* the [LexicalEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts) is always restored to its former state.

*StatementList* <span class="geq">:</span> *StatementList* *StatementListItem*

1.  Let *sl* be the result of evaluating *StatementList*.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*sl*).
3.  Let *s* be the result of evaluating *StatementListItem*.
4.  If *s*.\[\[type\]\] is <span style="font-family: sans-serif">throw</span>, return [Completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type)(*s*).
5.  If *s*.\[\[value\]\] is <span style="font-family: sans-serif">empty</span>, let *V* = *sl*.\[\[value\]\], otherwise let *V* = *s*.\[\[value\]\].
6.  Return [Completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type){\[\[type\]\]: *s*.\[\[type\]\], \[\[value\]\]: *V*, \[\[target\]\]: *s*.\[\[target\]\]}.

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> Steps 5 and 6 of the above algorithm ensure that the value of a *StatementList* is the value of the last value producing item in the *StatementList*. For example, the following calls to the `eval` function all return the value 1:

    eval("1;;;;;")

    eval("1;{}")

    eval("1;var a;")

<span id="sec-13.1.14" class="secnum">[13.1.14](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-blockdeclarationinstantiation "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: BlockDeclarationInstantiation( code, env )
====================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> When a *Block* or *CaseBlock* production is evaluated a new declarative [Environment Record](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-environment-records) is created and bindings for each block scoped variable, constant, function, generator function, or class declared in the block are instantiated in the [Environment Record](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-environment-records).

BlockDeclarationInstantiation is performed as follows using arguments code and env. code is the grammar production corresponding to the body of the block. env is the declarative [Environment Record](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-environment-records) in which bindings are to be created.

1.  Let *declarations* be the LexicallyScopedDeclarations of *code*.
2.  For each element *d* in *declarations* do
    1.  For each element *dn* of the BoundNames of *d* do
        1.  If IsConstantDeclaration of *d* is **true**, then
            1.  Let *status* be *env*.CreateImmutableBinding(*dn*, **true**).

        2.  Else,
            1.  Let *status* be *env*.CreateMutableBinding(*dn*, **false**).

        3.  [Assert](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-algorithm-conventions): *status* is never an [abrupt completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type).

    2.  If *d* is a *GeneratorDeclaration* production or a *FunctionDeclaration* production, then
        1.  Let *fn* be the sole element of the BoundNames of *d*
        2.  Let *fo* be the result of performing InstantiateFunctionObject for *d* with argument *env*.
        3.  Perform *env*.InitializeBinding(*fn*, *fo*).

<span id="sec-13.2" class="secnum">[13.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-declarations-and-the-variable-statement "link to this section")</span> Declarations and the Variable Statement
==================================================================================================================================================================================================================

<span id="sec-13.2.1" class="secnum">[13.2.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-let-and-const-declarations "link to this section")</span> Let and Const Declarations
============================================================================================================================================================================================

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> `let` and `const` declarations define variables that are scoped to [the running execution context](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts)’s [LexicalEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts). The variables are created when their containing [Lexical Environment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-lexical-environments) is instantiated but may not be accessed in any way until the variable’s *LexicalBinding* is evaluated. A variable defined by a *LexicalBinding* with an *Initializer* is assigned the value of its <span style="font-family: Times New Roman">*Initializer*’s</span> *AssignmentExpression* when the *LexicalBinding* is evaluated, not when the variable is created. If a *LexicalBinding* in a `let` declaration does not have an *Initializer* the variable is assigned the value **undefined** when the *LexicalBinding* is evaluated.

Syntax
------

*LexicalDeclaration*<sub>\[In,\\ Yield\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*LetOrConst* *BindingList*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `;`

*LetOrConst* <span class="geq">:</span>

`let`

`const`

*BindingList*<sub>\[In,\\ Yield\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*LexicalBinding*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub>

*BindingList*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `,` *LexicalBinding*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub>

*LexicalBinding*<sub>\[In,\\ Yield\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*BindingIdentifier*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub> *Initializer*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub>

*BindingPattern*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub> *Initializer*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub>

<span id="sec-13.2.1.1" class="secnum">[13.2.1.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-let-and-const-declarations-static-semantics-early-errors "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: Early Errors
==================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

*LexicalDeclaration* <span class="geq">:</span> *LetOrConst* *BindingList* `;`

-   It is a Syntax Error if the BoundNames of *BindingList* contains `"let"`.
-   It is a Syntax Error if the BoundNames of *BindingList* contains any duplicate entries.

*LexicalBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*<sub>opt</sub>

-   It is a Syntax Error if *Initializer* is not present and IsConstantDeclaration of the *LexicalDeclaration* containing this production is <span class="value">true</span>.

<span id="sec-13.2.1.2" class="secnum">[13.2.1.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-let-and-const-declarations-static-semantics-boundnames "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: BoundNames
==============================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [12.1.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-identifiers-static-semantics-boundnames), [13.2.2.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-variable-statement-static-semantics-boundnames), [13.2.3.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-destructuring-binding-patterns-static-semantics-boundnames), [13.6.4.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.1.3](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.2.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.4.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-generator-function-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.5.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-class-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [15.2.2.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-imports-static-semantics-boundnames), [15.2.3.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-exports-static-semantics-boundnames).

*LexicalDeclaration* <span class="geq">:</span> *LetOrConst* *BindingList* `;`

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingList*.

*BindingList* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingList* `,` *LexicalBinding*

1.  Let *names* be the BoundNames of *BindingList*.
2.  Append to *names* the elements of the BoundNames of *LexicalBinding.*
3.  Return *names*.

*LexicalBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*<sub>opt</sub>

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingIdentifier*.

*LexicalBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingPattern*.

<span id="sec-13.2.1.3" class="secnum">[13.2.1.3](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-let-and-const-declarations-static-semantics-isconstantdeclaration "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: IsConstantDeclaration
====================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [14.1.10](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-isconstantdeclaration), [14.4.8](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-generator-function-definitions-static-semantics-isconstantdeclaration), [14.5.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-class-definitions-static-semantics-isconstantdeclaration), [15.2.3.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-exports-static-semantics-isconstantdeclaration).

*LexicalDeclaration* <span class="geq">:</span> *LetOrConst* *BindingList* `;`

1.  Return IsConstantDeclaration of *LetOrConst*.

*LetOrConst* <span class="geq">:</span> `let`

1.  Return **false**.

*LetOrConst* <span class="geq">:</span> `const`

1.  Return **true**.

<span id="sec-13.2.1.4" class="secnum">[13.2.1.4](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-let-and-const-declarations-runtime-semantics-evaluation "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: Evaluation
================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

*LexicalDeclaration* <span class="geq">:</span> *LetOrConst* *BindingList* `;`

1.  Let *next* be the result of evaluating *BindingList*.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*next*).
3.  Return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(<span style="font-family:
                  sans-serif">empty</span>).

*BindingList* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingList* `,` *LexicalBinding*

1.  Let *next* be the result of evaluating *BindingList*.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*next*).
3.  Return the result of evaluating *LexicalBinding*.

*LexicalBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier*

1.  Let *lhs* be [ResolveBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-resolvebinding)(StringValue of *BindingIdentifier*).
2.  Return [InitializeReferencedBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-initializereferencedbinding)(*lhs*, **undefined**).

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> A static semantics rule ensures that this form of *LexicalBinding* never occurs in a `const` declaration.

*LexicalBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*

1.  Let *bindingId* be StringValue of *BindingIdentifier.*
2.  Let *lhs* be [ResolveBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-resolvebinding)(*bindingId*).
3.  Let *rhs* be the result of evaluating *Initializer*.
4.  Let *value* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*rhs*).
5.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*value*).
6.  If [IsAnonymousFunctionDefinition](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-isanonymousfunctiondefinition)(*Initializer)* is **true**, then
    1.  Let *hasNameProperty* be [HasOwnProperty](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-hasownproperty)(*value*, `"name"`).
    2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*hasNameProperty*).
    3.  If *hasNameProperty* is **false**, perform [SetFunctionName](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-setfunctionname)(*value*, *bindingId*).

7.  Return [InitializeReferencedBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-initializereferencedbinding)(*lhs*, *value*).

*LexicalBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*

1.  Let *rhs* be the result of evaluating *Initializer*.
2.  Let *value* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*rhs*).
3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*value*).
4.  Let *env* be [the running execution context](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts)’s [LexicalEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts).
5.  Return the result of performing BindingInitialization for *BindingPattern* using *value* and *env* as the *arguments*.

<span id="sec-13.2.2" class="secnum">[13.2.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-variable-statement "link to this section")</span> Variable Statement
============================================================================================================================================================================

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> A `var` statement declares variables that are scoped to [the running execution context](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts)’s [VariableEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts). Var variables are created when their containing [Lexical Environment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-lexical-environments) is instantiated and are initialized to **undefined** when created. Within the scope of any [VariableEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts) a common *BindingIdentifier* may appear in more than one *VariableDeclaration* but those declarations collective define only one variable. A variable defined by a *VariableDeclaration* with an *Initializer* is assigned the value of its <span style="font-family: Times New
          Roman">*Initializer*’s</span> *AssignmentExpression* when the *VariableDeclaration* is executed, not when the variable is created.

Syntax
------

*VariableStatement*<sub>\[Yield\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

`var` *VariableDeclarationList*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `;`

*VariableDeclarationList*<sub>\[In,\\ Yield\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*VariableDeclaration*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub>

*VariableDeclarationList*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `,` *VariableDeclaration*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub>

*VariableDeclaration*<sub>\[In,\\ Yield\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*BindingIdentifier*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub> *Initializer*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub>

*BindingPattern*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub> *Initializer*<sub>\[?In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub>

<span id="sec-13.2.2.1" class="secnum">[13.2.2.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-variable-statement-static-semantics-boundnames "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: BoundNames
======================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [12.1.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-identifiers-static-semantics-boundnames), [13.2.1.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-let-and-const-declarations-static-semantics-boundnames), [13.2.3.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-destructuring-binding-patterns-static-semantics-boundnames), [13.6.4.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.1.3](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.2.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.4.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-generator-function-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.5.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-class-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [15.2.2.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-imports-static-semantics-boundnames), [15.2.3.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-exports-static-semantics-boundnames).

*VariableDeclarationList* <span class="geq">:</span> *VariableDeclarationList* `,` *VariableDeclaration*

1.  Let *names* be BoundNames of *VariableDeclarationList*.
2.  Append to *names* the elements of BoundNames of *VariableDeclaration.*
3.  Return *names*.

*VariableDeclaration* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*<sub>opt</sub>

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingIdentifier*.

*VariableDeclaration* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingPattern*.

<span id="sec-13.2.2.2" class="secnum">[13.2.2.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-variable-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: VarDeclaredNames
==================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [13.0.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-statement-semantics-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.1.11](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-block-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.5.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-if-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.6.1.4](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-do-while-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.6.2.4](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-while-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.6.3.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.6.4.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.10.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-with-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.11.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-switch-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.12.12](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-labelled-statements-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.14.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-try-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [14.1.15](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [14.2.12](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [15.1.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-scripts-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [15.2.1.12](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-module-semantics-static-semantics-lexicallyscopeddeclarations).

*VariableStatement* <span class="geq">:</span> `var` *VariableDeclarationList* `;`

1.  Return BoundNames of *VariableDeclarationList.*

<span id="sec-13.2.2.3" class="secnum">[13.2.2.3](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-variable-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: VarScopedDeclarations
============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [13.0.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-statement-semantics-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.1.12](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-block-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.5.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-if-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.6.1.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-do-while-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.6.2.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-while-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.6.3.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.6.4.8](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.10.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-with-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.11.8](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-switch-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.12.13](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-labelled-statements-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.14.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-try-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [14.1.16](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [14.2.13](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [15.1.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-scripts-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [15.2.1.13](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-module-semantics-static-semantics-vardeclarednames).

*VariableDeclarationList* <span class="geq">:</span> *VariableDeclaration*

1.  Return a new [List](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-list-and-record-specification-type) containing *VariableDeclaration.*

*VariableDeclarationList* <span class="geq">:</span> *VariableDeclarationList* `,` *VariableDeclaration*

1.  Let *declarations* be VarScopedDeclarations of *VariableDeclarationList*.
2.  Append *VariableDeclaration* to *declarations.*
3.  Return *declarations*.

<span id="sec-13.2.2.4" class="secnum">[13.2.2.4](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-variable-statement-runtime-semantics-evaluation "link to this section")</span> <span style="font-family: sans-serif">Runtime</span> Semantics: Evaluation
=====================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

*VariableStatement* <span class="geq">:</span> `var` *VariableDeclarationList* `;`

1.  Let *next* be the result of evaluating *VariableDeclarationList*.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*next*).
3.  Return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)( <span style="font-family:
                  sans-serif">empty</span>).

*VariableDeclarationList* <span class="geq">:</span> *VariableDeclarationList* `,` *VariableDeclaration*

1.  Let *next* be the result of evaluating *VariableDeclarationList*.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*next*).
3.  Return the result of evaluating *VariableDeclaration*.

*VariableDeclaration* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier*

1.  Return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(<span style="font-family:
                  sans-serif">empty</span>).

*VariableDeclaration* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*

1.  Let *bindingId* be StringValue of *BindingIdentifier.*
2.  Let *lhs* be [ResolveBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-resolvebinding)(*bindingId*)
3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*lhs*).
4.  Let *rhs* be the result of evaluating *Initializer*.
5.  Let *value* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*rhs*).
6.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*value*).
7.  If [IsAnonymousFunctionDefinition](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-isanonymousfunctiondefinition)(*Initializer)* is **true**, then
    1.  Let *hasNameProperty* be [HasOwnProperty](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-hasownproperty)(*value*, `"name"`).
    2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*hasNameProperty*).
    3.  If *hasNameProperty* is **false**, perform [SetFunctionName](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-setfunctionname)(*value*, *bindingId*).

8.  Return [PutValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-putvalue)(*lhs*, *value*).

<span class="nh">NOTE </span> If a *VariableDeclaration* is nested within a with statement and the *BindingIdentifier* in the *VariableDeclaration* is the same as a property name of the binding object of the with statement’s object [Environment Record](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-environment-records), then step 7 will assign *value* to the property instead of assigning to the [VariableEnvironment](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-execution-contexts) binding of the *Identifier*.

*VariableDeclaration* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*

1.  Let *rhs* be the result of evaluating *Initializer*.
2.  Let *rval* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*rhs*).
3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*rval*).
4.  Return the result of performing BindingInitialization for *BindingPattern* passing *rval* and **undefined** as arguments.

<span id="sec-13.2.3" class="secnum">[13.2.3](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-destructuring-binding-patterns "link to this section")</span> Destructuring Binding Patterns
====================================================================================================================================================================================================

Syntax
------

*BindingPattern*<sub>\[Yield,GeneratorParameter\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*ObjectBindingPattern*<sub>\[?Yield,?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

*ArrayBindingPattern*<sub>\[?Yield,?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

*ObjectBindingPattern*<sub>\[Yield,GeneratorParameter\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

`{` `}`

`{` *BindingPropertyList*<sub>\[?Yield,?GeneratorParameter\]</sub> `}`

`{` *BindingPropertyList*<sub>\[?Yield,?GeneratorParameter\]</sub> `,` `}`

*ArrayBindingPattern*<sub>\[Yield,GeneratorParameter\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

`[` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingRestElement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]opt</sub> `]`

`[` *BindingElementList*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub> `]`

`[` *BindingElementList*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub> `,` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingRestElement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]opt</sub> `]`

*BindingPropertyList*<sub>\[Yield,GeneratorParameter\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*BindingProperty*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

*BindingPropertyList*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub> `,` *BindingProperty*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

*BindingElementList*<sub>\[Yield,GeneratorParameter\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*BindingElisionElement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

*BindingElementList*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub> `,` *BindingElisionElement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

*BindingElisionElement*<sub>\[Yield,GeneratorParameter\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingElement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

*BindingProperty*<sub>\[Yield,GeneratorParameter\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*SingleNameBinding*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

*PropertyName*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub> `:` *BindingElement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

*BindingElement*<sub>\[Yield,GeneratorParameter\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

*SingleNameBinding*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?GeneratorParameter\]</sub>

<span class="grhsannot">\[+GeneratorParameter\]</span> *BindingPattern*<sub>\[?Yield,GeneratorParameter\]</sub> *Initializer*<sub>\[In\]opt</sub>

<span class="grhsannot">\[~GeneratorParameter\]</span> *BindingPattern*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub> *Initializer*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub>

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="grhsannot">\[Yield, *GeneratorParameter*\]</span> <span class="geq">:</span>

<span class="grhsannot">\[+GeneratorParameter\]</span> *BindingIdentifier*<sub>\[Yield\]</sub> *Initializer*<sub>\[In\]opt</sub>

<span class="grhsannot">\[~GeneratorParameter\]</span> *BindingIdentifier*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub> *Initializer*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub>

*BindingRestElement*<sub>\[Yield,\\ GeneratorParameter\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

<span class="grhsannot">\[+GeneratorParameter\]</span> `...` *BindingIdentifier*<sub>\[Yield\]</sub>

<span class="grhsannot">\[~GeneratorParameter\]</span> `...` *BindingIdentifier*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub>

<span id="sec-13.2.3.1" class="secnum">[13.2.3.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-destructuring-binding-patterns-static-semantics-boundnames "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: BoundNames
==================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [12.1.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-identifiers-static-semantics-boundnames), [13.2.1.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-let-and-const-declarations-static-semantics-boundnames), [13.2.2.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-variable-statement-static-semantics-boundnames), [13.6.4.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.1.3](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.2.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.4.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-generator-function-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [14.5.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-class-definitions-static-semantics-boundnames), [15.2.2.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-imports-static-semantics-boundnames), [15.2.3.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-exports-static-semantics-boundnames).

*ObjectBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `{` `}`

1.  Return an empty [List](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-list-and-record-specification-type).

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> `]`

1.  Return an empty [List](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-list-and-record-specification-type).

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingRestElement* `]`

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingRestElement*.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *BindingElementList* `,` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> `]`

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingElementList*.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *BindingElementList* `,` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingRestElement* `]`

1.  Let *names* be BoundNames of *BindingElementList*.
2.  Append to *names* the elements of BoundNames of *BindingRestElement.*
3.  Return *names*.

*BindingPropertyList* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPropertyList* `,` *BindingProperty*

1.  Let *names* be BoundNames of *BindingPropertyList*.
2.  Append to *names* the elements of BoundNames of *BindingProperty.*
3.  Return *names*.

*BindingElementList* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingElementList* `,` *BindingElisionElement*

1.  Let *names* be BoundNames of *BindingElementList*.
2.  Append to *names* the elements of BoundNames of *BindingElisionElement.*
3.  Return *names*.

*BindingElisionElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingElement*

1.  Return BoundNames of *BindingElement*.

*BindingProperty* <span class="geq">:</span> *PropertyName* `:` *BindingElement*

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingElement*.

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*<sub>opt</sub>

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingIdentifier*.

*BindingElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*<sub>opt</sub>

1.  Return the BoundNames of *BindingPattern*.

<span id="sec-13.2.3.2" class="secnum">[13.2.3.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-destructuring-binding-patterns-static-semantics-containsexpression "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: ContainsExpression
==================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [14.1.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-containsexpression), [14.2.4](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-static-semantics-containsexpression).

*ObjectBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `{` `}`

1.  Return **false**.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> `]`

1.  Return **false**.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingRestElement* `]`

1.  Return **false**.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *BindingElementList* `,` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> `]`

1.  Return ContainsExpression of *BindingElementList*.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *BindingElementList* `,` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingRestElement* `]`

1.  Return ContainsExpression of *BindingElementList*.

*BindingPropertyList* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPropertyList* `,` *BindingProperty*

1.  Let *has* be ContainsExpression of *BindingPropertyList*.
2.  If *has* is **true**, return **true***.*
3.  Return ContainsExpression of *BindingProperty*.

*BindingElementList* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingElementList* `,` *BindingElisionElement*

1.  Let *has* be ContainsExpression of *BindingElementList*.
2.  If *has* is **true**, return **true***.*
3.  Return ContainsExpression of *BindingElisionElement*.

*BindingElisionElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingElement*

1.  Return ContainsExpression of *BindingElement*.

*BindingProperty* <span class="geq">:</span> *PropertyName* `:` *BindingElement*

1.  Let *has* be IsComputedPropertyKey of *PropertyName*.
2.  If *has* is **true**, return **true***.*
3.  Return the ContainsExpression of *BindingElement*.

*BindingElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*

1.  Return **true**.

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier*

1.  Return **false**.

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*

1.  Return **true**.

<span id="sec-13.2.3.3" class="secnum">[13.2.3.3](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-destructuring-binding-patterns-static-semantics-hasinitializer "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: HasInitializer
==========================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [14.1.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-hasinitializer), [14.2.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-static-semantics-hasinitializer).

*BindingElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern*

1.  Return **false**.

*BindingElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*

1.  Return **true**.

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier*

1.  Return **false**.

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*

1.  Return **true**.

<span id="sec-13.2.3.4" class="secnum">[13.2.3.4](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-destructuring-binding-patterns-static-semantics-issimpleparameterlist "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: IsSimpleParameterList
========================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [14.1.12](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-issimpleparameterlist), [14.2.9](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-static-semantics-coveredformalslist).

*BindingElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern*

1.  Return **false**.

*BindingElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*

1.  Return **false**.

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier*

1.  Return **true**.

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*

1.  Return **false**.

<span id="sec-13.2.3.5" class="secnum">[13.2.3.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-destructuring-binding-patterns-runtime-semantics-bindinginitialization "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: BindingInitialization
==========================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

With parameters value and environment.

See also: [12.1.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-identifiers-runtime-semantics-bindinginitialization), [13.6.4.9](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-runtime-semantics-bindinginitialization).

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> When **undefined** is passed for environment it indicates that a [PutValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-putvalue) operation should be used to assign the initialization value. This is the case for formal parameter lists of non-strict functions. In that case the formal parameter bindings are preinitialized in order to deal with the possibility of multiple parameters with the same name.

*BindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> *ObjectBindingPattern*

1.  Let *valid* be [RequireObjectCoercible](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-requireobjectcoercible)(*value*).
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*valid*).
3.  Return the result of performing BindingInitialization for *ObjectBindingPattern* using *value* and *environment* as arguments.

*BindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> *ArrayBindingPattern*

1.  Let *iterator* be [GetIterator](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getiterator)(*value*).
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*iterator*).
3.  Let *iteratorRecord* be Record {\[\[iterator\]\]: *iterator*, \[\[done\]\]: **false**}.
4.  Let *result* be IteratorBindingInitialization for *ArrayBindingPattern* using *iteratorRecord*, and *environment* as arguments.
5.  If *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] is **false**, return [IteratorClose](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-iteratorclose)(*iterator*, *result*).
6.  Return *result*.

*ObjectBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `{` `}`

1.  Return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(<span style="font-family:
                  sans-serif">empty</span>).

*BindingPropertyList* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPropertyList* `,` *BindingProperty*

1.  Let *status* be the result of performing BindingInitialization for *BindingPropertyList* using *value* and *environment* as arguments.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*status*).
3.  Return the result of performing BindingInitialization for *BindingProperty* using *value* and *environment* as arguments.

*BindingProperty* <span class="geq">:</span> *SingleNameBinding*

1.  Let *name* be the string that is the only element of BoundNames of *SingleNameBinding*.
2.  Return the result of performing KeyedBindingInitialization for *SingleNameBinding* using *value*, *environment*, and *name* as the arguments.

*BindingProperty* <span class="geq">:</span> *PropertyName* `:` *BindingElement*

1.  Let *P* be the result of evaluating *PropertyName*
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*P*).
3.  Return the result of performing KeyedBindingInitialization for *BindingElement* using *value*, *environment*, and *P* as arguments.

<span id="sec-13.2.3.6" class="secnum">[13.2.3.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-destructuring-binding-patterns-runtime-semantics-iteratorbindinginitialization "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: IteratorBindingInitialization
==========================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

With parameters iteratorRecord, and environment.

See also: [14.1.18](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-runtime-semantics-iteratorbindinginitialization), [14.2.14](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-runtime-semantics-iteratorbindinginitialization).

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> When **undefined** is passed for environment it indicates that a [PutValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-putvalue) operation should be used to assign the initialization value. This is the case for formal parameter lists of non-strict functions. In that case the formal parameter bindings are preinitialized in order to deal with the possibility of multiple parameters with the same name.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` `]`

1.  Return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(<span style="font-family:
                  sans-serif">empty</span>).

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *Elision* `]`

1.  Return the result of performing IteratorDestructuringAssignmentEvaluation of *Elision* with *iteratorRecord* as the argument.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingRestElement* `]`

1.  If *Elision* is present, then
    1.  Let *status* be the result of performing IteratorDestructuringAssignmentEvaluation of *Elision* with *iteratorRecord* as the argument.
    2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*status*).

2.  Return the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *BindingRestElement* with *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as arguments.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *BindingElementList* `]`

1.  Return the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *BindingElementList* with *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as arguments.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *BindingElementList* `,` `]`

1.  Return the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *BindingElementList* with *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as arguments.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *BindingElementList* `,` *Elision* `]`

1.  Let *status* be the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *BindingElementList* with *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as arguments.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*status*).
3.  Return the result of performing IteratorDestructuringAssignmentEvaluation of *Elision* with *iteratorRecord* as the argument.

*ArrayBindingPattern* <span class="geq">:</span> `[` *BindingElementList* `,` *Elision*<sub>opt</sub> *BindingRestElement* `]`

1.  Let *status* be the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *BindingElementList* with *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as arguments.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*status*).
3.  If *Elision* is present, then
    1.  Let *status* be the result of performing IteratorDestructuringAssignmentEvaluation of *Elision* with *iteratorRecord* as the argument.
    2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*status*).

4.  Return the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *BindingRestElement* with *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as arguments.

*BindingElementList* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingElisionElement*

1.  Return the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *BindingElisionElement* with *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as arguments.

*BindingElementList* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingElementList* `,` *BindingElisionElement*

1.  Let *status* be the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *BindingElementList* *with* *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as arguments.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*status*).
3.  Return the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *BindingElisionElement* using *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as arguments.

*BindingElisionElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingElement*

1.  Return the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization of *BindingElement* with *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as the arguments.

*BindingElisionElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *Elision* *BindingElement*

1.  Let *status* be the result of performing IteratorDestructuringAssignmentEvaluation of *Elision* with *iteratorRecord* as the argument.
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*status*).
3.  Return the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization of *BindingElement* with *iteratorRecord* and *environment* as the arguments.

*BindingElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *SingleNameBinding*

1.  Return the result of performing IteratorBindingInitialization for *SingleNameBinding* with *iteratorRecord* *and* *environment* as the arguments.

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*<sub>opt</sub>

1.  Let *bindingId* be StringValue of *BindingIdentifier.*
2.  Let *lhs* be [ResolveBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-resolvebinding)(*bindingId*, *environment*).
3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*lhs*).
4.  If *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] is **false**, then
    1.  Let *next* be [IteratorStep](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-iteratorstep)(*iteratorRecord*.\[\[iterator\]\]).
    2.  If *next* is an [abrupt completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type), set *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] to **true**.
    3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*next*).
    4.  If *next* is **false**, set *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] to **true**.
    5.  Else,
        1.  Let *v* be [IteratorValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-iteratorvalue)(*next*).
        2.  If *v* is an [abrupt completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type), set *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] to **true**.
        3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*v*).

5.  If *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] is **true**, let *v* be **undefined**.
6.  If *Initializer* is present and *v* is **undefined**, then
    1.  Let *defaultValue* be the result of evaluating *Initializer*.
    2.  Let *v* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*defaultValue*).
    3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*v*).
    4.  If [IsAnonymousFunctionDefinition](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-isanonymousfunctiondefinition)(*Initializer)* is **true**, then
        1.  Let *hasNameProperty* be [HasOwnProperty](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-hasownproperty)(*v*, `"name"`).
        2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*hasNameProperty*).
        3.  If *hasNameProperty* is **false**, perform [SetFunctionName](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-setfunctionname)(*v*, *bindingId*).

7.  If *environment* is **undefined**, return [PutValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-putvalue)(*lhs*, *v*).
8.  Return [InitializeReferencedBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-initializereferencedbinding)(*lhs*, *v*).

*BindingElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*<sub>opt</sub>

1.  If *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] is **false**, then
    1.  Let *next* be [IteratorStep](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-iteratorstep)(*iteratorRecord*.\[\[iterator\]\]).
    2.  If *next* is an [abrupt completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type), set *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] to **true**.
    3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*next*).
    4.  If *next* is **false**, set *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] to **true**.
    5.  Else
        1.  Let *v* be [IteratorValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-iteratorvalue)(*next*).
        2.  If *v* is an [abrupt completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type), set *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] to **true**.
        3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*v*).

2.  If *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] is **true**, let *v* be **undefined**.
3.  If *Initializer* is present and *v* is **undefined**, then
    1.  Let *defaultValue* be the result of evaluating *Initializer*.
    2.  Let *v* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*defaultValue*).
    3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*v*).

4.  Return the result of performing BindingInitialization of *BindingPattern* with *v* and *environment* as the arguments.

*BindingRestElement* <span class="geq">:</span> `...` *BindingIdentifier*

1.  Let *lhs* be [ResolveBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-resolvebinding)(StringValue of *BindingIdentifier, environment*).
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*lhs*).
3.  Let *A* be [ArrayCreate](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arraycreate)(0).
4.  Let *n*=0.
5.  Repeat**,**
    1.  If *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] is **false**,
        1.  Let *next* be [IteratorStep](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-iteratorstep)(*iteratorRecord*.\[\[iterator\]\]).
        2.  If *next* is an [abrupt completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type), set *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] to **true**.
        3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*next*).
        4.  If *next* is **false**, set *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] to **true**.

    2.  If *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] is **true**, then
        1.  If *environment* is **undefined**, return [PutValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-putvalue)(*lhs*, *A*).
        2.  Return [InitializeReferencedBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-initializereferencedbinding)(*lhs*, *A*).

    3.  Let *nextValue* be [IteratorValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-iteratorvalue)(*next*).
    4.  If *nextValue* is an [abrupt completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type), set *iteratorRecord*.\[\[done\]\] to **true**.
    5.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*nextValue*).
    6.  Let *status* be [CreateDataProperty](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-createdataproperty)(*A*, [ToString](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-tostring) (*n*), *nextValue*).
    7.  [Assert](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-algorithm-conventions): *status* is **true**.
    8.  Increment *n* by 1.

<span id="sec-13.2.3.7" class="secnum">[13.2.3.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-runtime-semantics-keyedbindinginitialization "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: KeyedBindingInitialization
=====================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

With parameters value, environment, and propertyName.

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> When **undefined** is passed for environment it indicates that a [PutValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-putvalue) operation should be used to assign the initialization value. This is the case for formal parameter lists of non-strict functions. In that case the formal parameter bindings are preinitialized in order to deal with the possibility of multiple parameters with the same name.

*BindingElement* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingPattern* *Initializer*<sub>opt</sub>

1.  Let *v* be [GetV](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getv)(*value*, *propertyName*).
2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*v*).
3.  If *Initializer* is present and *v* is **undefined**, then
    1.  Let *defaultValue* be the result of evaluating *Initializer*.
    2.  Let *v* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*defaultValue*).
    3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*v*).

4.  Return the result of performing BindingInitialization for *BindingPattern* passing *v* and *environment* as arguments.

*SingleNameBinding* <span class="geq">:</span> *BindingIdentifier* *Initializer*<sub>opt</sub>

1.  Let *bindingId* be StringValue of *BindingIdentifier.*
2.  Let *lhs* be [ResolveBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-resolvebinding)(*bindingId, environment*).
3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*lhs*).
4.  Let *v* be [GetV](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getv)(*value*, *propertyName*).
5.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*v*).
6.  If *Initializer* is present and *v* is **undefined**, then
    1.  Let *defaultValue* be the result of evaluating *Initializer*.
    2.  Let *v* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*defaultValue*).
    3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*v*).
    4.  If [IsAnonymousFunctionDefinition](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-isanonymousfunctiondefinition)(*Initializer*) is **true**, then
        1.  Let *hasNameProperty* be [HasOwnProperty](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-hasownproperty)(*v*, `"name"`).
        2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*hasNameProperty*).
        3.  If *hasNameProperty* is **false**, perform [SetFunctionName](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-setfunctionname)(*v*, *bindingId*).

7.  If *environment* is **undefined**, return [PutValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-putvalue)(*lhs*, *v*).
8.  Return [InitializeReferencedBinding](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-initializereferencedbinding)(*lhs*, *v*).

`;`

<span id="sec-13.3.1" class="secnum">[13.3.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-empty-statement-runtime-semantics-evaluation "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: Evaluation
=================================================================================================================================================================================================================

<span id="sec-13.4" class="secnum">[13.4](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-expression-statement "link to this section")</span> Expression Statement
============================================================================================================================================================================

Syntax
------

*ExpressionStatement*<sub>\[Yield\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

<span class="grhsannot">\[lookahead ∉ {`{`, `function`, `class`, `let [`}\]</span> *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `;`

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> An *ExpressionStatement* cannot start with a U+007B (left curly bracket) because that might make it ambiguous with a *Block*. Also, an *ExpressionStatement* cannot start with the `function` or `class` keywords because that would make it ambiguous with a *FunctionDeclaration*, a *GeneratorDeclaration*, or a *ClassDeclaration*. An *ExpressionStatement* cannot start with the two token sequence `let [` because that would make it ambiguous with a `let` *LexicalDeclaration* whose first *LexicalBinding* was an *ArrayBindingPattern*.

<span id="sec-13.4.1" class="secnum">[13.4.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-expression-statement-runtime-semantics-evaluation "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: Evaluation
======================================================================================================================================================================================================================

*ExpressionStatement* <span class="geq">:</span> *Expression* `;`

1.  Let *exprRef* be the result of evaluating *Expression*.
2.  Return [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*exprRef*).

<span id="sec-13.5" class="secnum">[13.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-if-statement "link to this section")</span> The `if` Statement

Syntax
------

*IfStatement*<sub>\[Yield,\\ Return\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

`if` `(` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `)` *Statement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?Return\]</sub> `else` *Statement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?Return\]</sub>

`if` `(` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `)` *Statement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?Return\]</sub>

Each `else` for which the choice of associated `if` is ambiguous shall be associated with the nearest possible **if** that would otherwise have no corresponding `else`.

<span id="sec-13.5.1" class="secnum">[13.5.1](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-if-statement-static-semantics-early-errors "link to this section")</span> Static Semantics: Early Errors

`if` `(` *Expression* `)` *Statement*

-   It is a Syntax Error if [IsLabelledFunction](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-islabelledfunction)(*Statement*) is <span class="value">true</span>.

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> It is only necessary to apply this rule if the extension specified in [B.3.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-labelled-function-declarations) is implemented.

See also: [13.0.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-statement-semantics-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.1.11](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-block-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.2.2.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-variable-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.6.1.4](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-do-while-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.6.2.4](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-while-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.6.3.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.6.4.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.10.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-with-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.11.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-switch-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.12.12](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-labelled-statements-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [13.14.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-try-statement-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [14.1.15](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [14.2.12](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [15.1.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-scripts-static-semantics-vardeclarednames), [15.2.1.12](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-module-semantics-static-semantics-lexicallyscopeddeclarations).

==================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

See also: [13.0.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-statement-semantics-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.1.12](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-block-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.2.2.3](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-variable-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.6.1.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-do-while-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.6.2.5](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-while-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.6.3.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.6.4.8](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.10.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-with-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.11.8](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-switch-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.12.13](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-labelled-statements-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [13.14.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-try-statement-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [14.1.16](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-function-definitions-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [14.2.13](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-arrow-function-definitions-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [15.1.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-scripts-static-semantics-varscopeddeclarations), [15.2.1.13](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-module-semantics-static-semantics-vardeclarednames).

3.  Return *declarations*.

*IfStatement* <span class="geq">:</span> `if` `(` *Expression* `)` *Statement*

1.  Return the VarDeclaredNames of *Statement*.

<span id="sec-13.5.7" class="secnum">[13.5.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-if-statement-runtime-semantics-evaluation "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: Evaluation
==============================================================================================================================================================================================================

*IfStatement* <span class="geq">:</span> `if` `(` *Expression* `)` *Statement* `else` *Statement*

1.  Let *exprRef* be the result of evaluating *Expression*.
2.  Let *exprValue* be [ToBoolean](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-toboolean)([GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*exprRef*)).
3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*exprValue*).
4.  If *exprValue* is **true**, then
    1.  Let *stmtCompletion* be the result of evaluating the first *Statement*.

5.  Else,
    1.  Let *stmtCompletion* be the result of evaluating the second *Statement*.

6.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*stmtCompletion*).
7.  If *stmtCompletion*.\[\[value\]\] is not <span style="font-family: sans-serif">empty</span>, return *stmtCompletion*.
8.  Return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(**undefined**).

*IfStatement* <span class="geq">:</span> `if` `(` *Expression* `)` *Statement*

1.  Let *exprRef* be the result of evaluating *Expression*.
2.  Let *exprValue* be [ToBoolean](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-toboolean)([GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*exprRef*)).
3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*exprValue*).
4.  If *exprValue* is **false**, then
    1.  Return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(**undefined**).

5.  Else,
    1.  Let *stmtCompletion* be the result of evaluating *Statement*.
    2.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*stmtCompletion*).
    3.  If *stmtCompletion*.\[\[value\]\] is not <span style="font-family: sans-serif">empty</span>, return *stmtCompletion*.
    4.  Return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(**undefined**).

<span id="sec-13.6" class="secnum">[13.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-iteration-statements "link to this section")</span> Iteration Statements
============================================================================================================================================================================

Syntax
------

*IterationStatement*<sub>\[Yield,\\ Return\]</sub> <span class="geq">:</span>

`do` *Statement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?Return\]</sub> `while` `(` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `)` `;`

`while` `(` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `)` *Statement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?Return\]</sub>

`for` `(` <span class="grhsannot">\[lookahead ∉ {`let [`}\]</span> *Expression*<sub>\[?Yield\]opt</sub> `;` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub> `;` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub> `)` *Statement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?Return\]</sub>

`for` `(` `var` *VariableDeclarationList*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub> `;` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub> `;` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub> `)` *Statement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?Return\]</sub>

`for` `(` *LexicalDeclaration*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub> *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub> `;` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]opt</sub> `)` *Statement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?Return\]</sub>

`for` `(` <span class="grhsannot">\[lookahead ∉ {`let [`}\]</span> *LeftHandSideExpression*<sub>\[?Yield\]</sub> `in` *Expression*<sub>\[In,\\ ?Yield\]</sub> `)` *Statement*<sub>\[?Yield,\\ ?Return\]</sub>

<span id="sec-13.6.0.2" class="secnum">[13.6.0.2](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-loopcontinues "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: LoopContinues(completion, labelSet)
===============================================================================================================================================================================================================

The abstract operation <span style="font-family: Times New Roman">LoopContinues</span> with arguments completion and labelSet is defined by the following steps:

1.  If *completion*.\[\[type\]\] is <span style="font-family: sans-serif">normal</span>, return **true**.
2.  If *completion*.\[\[type\]\] is not <span style="font-family: sans-serif">continue</span>, return **false**.
3.  If *completion*.\[\[target\]\] is <span style="font-family: sans-serif">empty</span>, return **true**.
4.  If *completion*.\[\[target\]\] is an element of *labelSet*, return **true**.
5.  Return **false**.

<span class="nh">NOTE</span> Within the *Statement* part of an *IterationStatement* a *ContinueStatement* may be used to begin a new iteration.

<span id="sec-13.6.1.6" class="secnum">[13.6.1.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-do-while-statement-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: LabelledEvaluation
========================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

With argument labelSet.

See also: [13.0.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-statement-semantics-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation), [13.6.2.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-while-statement-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation), [13.6.3.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-statement-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation), [13.6.4.11](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation), [13.12.14](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-labelled-statements-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation).

*IterationStatement* <span class="geq">:</span> `do` *Statement* `while` `(` *Expression* `)` `;`

1.  Let *V* = **undefined**.
2.  Repeat
    1.  Let *stmt* be the result of evaluating *Statement*.
    2.  If [LoopContinues](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-loopcontinues)(*stmt*, *labelSet*) is **false**, return [Completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type)(*stmt*).
    3.  If *stmt*.\[\[value\]\] is not <span style="font-family: sans-serif">empty</span>, let *V* = *stmt*.\[\[value\]\]*.*
    4.  Let *exprRef* be the result of evaluating *Expression*.
    5.  Let *exprValue* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*exprRef*).
    6.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*exprValue*).
    7.  If [ToBoolean](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-toboolean)(*exprValue*) is **false**, return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(*V*).

<span id="sec-13.6.2.6" class="secnum">[13.6.2.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-while-statement-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation "link to this section")</span> Runtime Semantics: LabelledEvaluation
=====================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

With argument labelSet.

See also: [13.0.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-statement-semantics-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation), [13.6.1.6](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-do-while-statement-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation), [13.6.3.7](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-statement-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation), [13.6.4.11](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-for-in-and-for-of-statements-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation), [13.12.14](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-labelled-statements-runtime-semantics-labelledevaluation).

*IterationStatement* <span class="geq">:</span> `while` `(` *Expression* `)` *Statement*

1.  Let *V* = **undefined**.
2.  Repeat
    1.  Let *exprRef* be the result of evaluating *Expression*.
    2.  Let *exprValue* be [GetValue](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-getvalue)(*exprRef*).
    3.  [ReturnIfAbrupt](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-returnifabrupt)(*exprValue*).
    4.  If [ToBoolean](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-toboolean)(*exprValue*) is **false**, return [NormalCompletion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-normalcompletion)(*V*).
    5.  Let *stmt* be the result of evaluating *Statement*.
    6.  If [LoopContinues](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-loopcontinues) (*stmt*, *labelSet*) is **false**, return [Completion](https://people.mozilla.org/~jorendorff/es6-draft.html#sec-completion-record-specification-type)(*stmt*).
    7.  If *stmt*.\[\[value\]\] is not <span style="font-family: sans-serif">empty</span>, let *V* = *stmt*.\[\[value\]\].
